oai_dc:dc.dc:title: COST EFFECTIVENESS OF WAVE POWER EXTRACTION AT EROSIVE COASTS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kondo, Hideo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cost effectiveness
wave power
power extraction
erosion
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cost of wave power extraction is investigated for the coasts where erosion has been continuing without suitable countermeasures. By a wave power extraction, a shoreline accretion is expected due to the mean sea level drop. Cost effectiveness is discussed with the concept of total cost instead of the generation cost only.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 25 (1996): Proceedings of 25th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Orlando, Florida, 1996.
